thread.title: Philip Proctor

author: Philip Proctor
title: Philip Proctor
text: From my initial telephone enquiry I was dealt with in a very friendly and efficient way - with a good knowledge of the product I was interested in and a willingness to send me samples. I was kept informed of the delivery timescale and when the item arrived it was extremely well wrapped and in perfect condition - a light bulb was even included which I hadn't expected.
